Issue.creator: dbshah
Issue.summary: Able to pass YAML file as MSP configuration
Issue.description: The peer and orderer right now require the certificates to be in msp folder structure. A change in one of the certificates in the msp requires the peer/orderer process to be manually restarted. Can there be an enhancement to the process, where an ability to pass the msp as a JSON or YAML file is added. This way it might be easier to watch changes on that file and restart the peer/orderer process if needed. Also, that way instead of dealing with the msp folder structure, a JSON or YAML format can be defined and folders are dealt with by fabric code and not the user.
